summary:
An OP (Overpowered) mod for people who just want to get stuff done.

Comes equipped with 5,000 everything, so you don't get any bullcrap.
descriptionHtml:
Once, before the empire was constructed, existed a god that goes by the name, Arkanos. Said to be the god of death, but being forgotten. The humans that had remembered him, and had not told anyone, were granted power beyond their wildest dreams. The Arkanos Followers.

I bring you, an OP (Over-Powered) race that will rock your socks off... assuming you're wearing socks.

Tired of having low stats? Check the stats out:

- 5000 Health Points
- 5000 Mana Points
- 5000 Stamina

It allows you to start out with random level 100 perks, such as archery, one-handed, and light-armor.
author: BigPDiddy
